participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Kind-hearted and nurturing, with a passion for animal welfare. She is disciplined yet enjoys a good laugh.
participant_1.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i'm ex military. my favorite color is navy blue.

participant_2.name: Jack Thornton
participant_2.personality: Quirky and innovative, with a strong sense of individuality. He tends to be introverted but thrives in creative endeavors.
participant_2.background: i helped design the game starcraft. i'm working on building a robot to be my body double. i have an allergy to water. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am a recluse.
